name: Pipeline View
description: Primary workspace for a single project. Displays the 9-stage pipeline progress bar at the top with the active stage editor loaded below. This is the main layout wrapper that manages stage navigation and loads the appropriate stage editor component.

components.name: PipelineProgressBar
components.description: Horizontal 9-step stepper showing all stages as connected nodes. Completed stages have green check icons. Active stage is highlighted with primary color and pulse animation. Locked stages are grayed out with lock icon. Clicking a completed stage navigates to its review view. Shows stage names on hover/tooltip.

components.name: StageEditorContainer
components.description: Dynamic container that loads the appropriate stage editor component based on the current stage number. Wraps all editors with a consistent header (stage name, status badge, last generated time) and footer (action bar).

components.name: StageHeader
components.description: Shows stage name, stage number badge, status indicator (locked/active/generating/review/complete), last validated timestamp, and generation count.

components.name: StageActionBar
components.description: Bottom action bar with contextual buttons: Generate (triggers AI), Save (saves human edits), Validate & Complete (validates and advances), Revert (unlocks for re-editing). Buttons are enabled/disabled based on stage status. Shows loading spinner during generation.

components.name: StageNavigationButtons
components.description: Previous/Next stage buttons for linear navigation. Previous is always available for completed stages. Next is available only if current stage is complete.

interactions.trigger: Click stage node in progress bar
interactions.behavior: Navigate to that stage if completed or active
POST /api/projects/:id/stages/:num/revert → confirm dialog → lock subsequent stages

stateManagement.serverState: useQuery for project + all stages. useMutation for generate/save/complete/revert.
